Text:
I got a copy of the app from ESET.  The installed failed and locked up my iMac.  I did a force shutdown and rebooted but the system stayed locked.  I had to boot into Safe Mode and remove the app.  Things are back to normal.

24" iMac
Snow Leopard
4 Gig RAM
2.8 GHz proc
Intel
